links.title: Is it time to give up on this bull market?
links.description: The S&P500 treaded water Tuesday, the day after the biggest drop in a couple of months. Volume was average, but it was similar to Monday's relatively benign volumes. Trade tensions flared up over the weekend as Trump and China continue escalating their rhetoric.

messages.body: Why Apple Might Rethink Its iPhone Pricing a Little $AAPL http://dlvr.it/QYgf73

links.title: Why Apple Might Rethink Its iPhone Pricing a Little
links.description: Two well-respected analysts think Apple ( AAPL) will be more flexible with its iPhone pricing this year, and they have their reasons. On Tuesday, Morgan Stanley's Katy Huberty forecast Apple will assign an $899 starting price to the 5.8-inch iPhone X successor that's due to launch this year, while charging $100 more for a 6.5-inch model.

links.title: China drops tariffs on animal feed from Asian countries as U.S. dispute escalates
links.description: China will remove import tariffs on animal feed ingredients including soybeans, soymeal and rapeseed from five Asian countries, the Ministry of Finance said on Tuesday, a sign Beijing is seeking alternative supplies of the commodities as a trade dispute escalates with the United States. links.title: Trump Signals He Favors Mnuchin's Path to Shield Technology From China
links.description: President Donald Trump said Tuesday he favors using a U.S. committee that scrutinizes foreign acquisitions of American companies to limit Chinese investments in sensitive American technologies.
